Text.Value: Stop this! We... we won't ask again.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The two brothers ready their blades. Johl more confidently than Demir but It should be obviously that they don't really know what they're doing as they advance on the old woman.
EditorData.NodeContext: Fear in your voice as well as determiation. You're terrified of this monster but you want to save your sister.

Text.Value: Lads, for the love of all that is holy, I've never clapped eyes on your poor sister.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Looking at the brothers - hasn't noticed the player yet.
EditorData.NodeContext: Opening line of the dialogue. Annoyed as you plead with the two men who advance on you. You sound sincere and genuine.

Text.Value: This is nothing to do with me. Goodbye.
Bollocks.

EditorData.NodeContext: A curse - angry that your charade as been ruined.

Text.Value: If you're lying about the girl, what's to say this isn't a disguise?
I'm not getting involved.
*The old woman's face creases with false concern. You realise she's lying about seeing this girl, Mayrina.*
Sweetie, be careful!

EditorData.NodeContext: Player has rushed to your side and is about to fight. Calling out as you back away - fear and worry in your voice.

Text.Value: Don't bloody stand there gaping, get him!
Don't bloody stand there gaping, get her!
Don't bloody stand there gaping!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Readying your weapon and gesturing for your brother to do the same.
EditorData.NodeContext: Taking control of the situation. Barking out an order to your brother to get it together and attack - angry in your voice.

Text.Value: Wait - what? You saw through my magic?

EditorData.NodeContext: Player has seen through her illusion. Shocked.

Text.Value: *Auntie Ethel's face creases with false concern. You realise she's lying about seeing this girl, Mayrina.*
Tell the truth - what did you do to their sister?
How about you all just calm down. What's going on here?
You're lying; you have seen this girl.
Some advice? You ever darken my door, you'd best have that head bowed and an apology at the ready.

EditorData.NodeContext: This is a menacing thrreat. The player knows there will be more than tea waiting for them. Big, evil smile.

Text.Value: Bye-bye, now!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: With a cackle, she disappears with a flourish.
EditorData.SFXTags: SFX [Hag] With a cackle, she disappears with a flourish. <SimonG>
EditorData.VFXTags: VFX [Hag] With a cackle, she disappears with a flourish. <SimonG>

Text.Value: Lower your weapons. She's just an old woman.
Careful! Don't trust a word out of her mouth. Our sister went to the hag, and we ain't seen her since.

EditorData.NodeContext: Careful is barked and forceful. You know Ethel is twisted and devious, this is a warning/order.

Text.Value: Lower your weapons, I know this lady.
Enough. Where is she?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Hand  moving towards weapon - both brothers preparing to charge but Demir looks more afraid and hesitant whereas Johl is gung ho and ready to go.
EditorData.NodeContext: Angry and on the brink of violence. You're a hair breadth from charging with your weapon.

Text.Value: Stop! An illusion covers this swamp - who's responsible?
H-he's with the hag!
S-she's with the hag!
They're with the hag!

EditorData.NodeContext: You're terrified - you didn't want a fight to begin with.

Text.Value: You were supposed to rush to my defence, love. Fat lot of good you are.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: With a flourish, her form began to fade as she grinned, revealing too many teeth.
EditorData.NodeContext: The player has ruined her plan - she wanted to force the player to kill the brothers. Angry and annoyed.

Text.Value: I won't let you hurt Auntie Ethel.
You there! Please, I don't know what's come over these boys. I just want to go home.

EditorData.NodeContext: You've caught sight of the player. You call out, fear and pleading in your voice - in your mind you've hatched a plan - you're going to force the player to defend you and kill the brothers.

Text.Value: I won't let you hurt this woman.
Drop the act, hag. You was the last to see Mayrina.

EditorData.NodeContext: Not buying Auntie Ethel's claim that she hasn't seen Mayrina. Accusation and fury in your voice - you're prepared to get violent if needs be.

Text.Value: Thank goodness you're here, sweetie. I - I don't know what's come over these boys.

EditorData.NodeContext: You've caught sight of the player. You've met the player before. You call out, fear and pleading in your voice - in your mind you've hatched a plan - you're going to force the player to defend you and kill the brothers.

Text.Value: Hand over heart, I don't know their sister. I will gladly help you all look for her though.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Looking for the brothers and the settling her eyes on the player. Hand on her chest as she pleads.
EditorData.NodeContext: Pleading with the player and the brothers. You sound completely sincere and genuine, as if the thought of this missing girl is just tearing you up.

Text.Value: Ethel, what did you do to their sister?
Bollocks.

EditorData.NodeContext: You are PISSED. A total drop of the old lady nice act with this word.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Demir and Johl ]SN Both of them choke on poisonus cloud that suddenly appear on there heads. [GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHuman] Casting her spell <SimonG> [Demir and Johl ] SN collaps on the floor dead. Need to branch well with previous anim. <SimonG>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Brothers choke - frothing at the mouth as poison surrounds their heads.  They collapse on the ground - dead,
EditorData.SFXTags: SFX [Demir and Johl ]  collapsing on the floor
EditorData.VFXTags: VFX on [Demir and Johl ] cloud poinson apprearing on there head as they choke. VFX on [GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHuman] Casting her spell.

Text.Value: Just let her go. Please.

EditorData.NodeContext: Your brother is on the brink of violence and you're trying to regain control of the situation. You just want your baby sister back, you don't want anyone to get hurt.

Text.Value: Thanks for ruining my fun.

EditorData.NodeContext: Said with a dismissive tone, like the player isn't even worth your time or effort.

Text.Value: Just because she's an old woman in a swamp, she's a hag? Lay off the fairy tales, lads.

Synopsis:
Auntie Ethel has been cornered by two brothers - Demir and Johl - who claim Ethel is a hag and has taken their sister. Ethel is pleading that she has no idea what they're talking about and begs the player to help her.
Ethel is actually a hag. Should we step back and do thing, she summons monsters to cut the two brothers down. Should we side with her, we have to kill the brothers. Should we side with the brothers, Ethel is angry and disappears with a threat.
